charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1101_0100:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was wandering
the town, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] felt like someone was calling [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ].
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1101_0200:
Looking around, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] noticed Will 
and Xatu standing there.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_0401_0600: I see that my psychic powers reached you.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_0302_0700: I felt like somebody was calling me.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_0402_0800: I see that my psychic powers reached you.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_0900:
I thought this would be a good opportunity for us
to get better acquainted with each other.
So I set up this meeting so we could chat.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_1000:
I thought...that I might need your help in order
to become stronger.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_0401_1200: I thought so, too...but I was wrong.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_0402_1400:
That’s right.
I sense raw power sleeping inside of you.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_1500:
I trained vigorously in order to become a
member of the Elite Four.
And at long last, I was able to become one.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_1600:
I was confident that nobody but the Champion
could defeat me.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_1700:
But one day, a random Trainer was able to
defeat me easily.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_1800: I was much weaker than I had thought.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_1900:
That is why I want to find new power at
the PML.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_2000: I want to defeat that Trainer with that power!
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_2100:
I shall show you how I am training to do so.
Look into Xatu’s eyes.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_2200:
It is said that Xatu is gazing at both the past
and the future.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_2300:
By looking into her eyes, you can feel like you’re
able to predict what will happen in battle!
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_0402_2800:
I appreciate you taking me seriously,
but please don’t lie.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_0402_2900: I wonder why it’s not working.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_3000:
Well, this is a predicament.
I thought you’d be able to feel something, but...
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_3400:
Did you feel it, too? Like the cheers and 
excitement of thousands of people!
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_3900:
A vision of us facing each other at the PML.
At least that is how I interpreted it.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_4000: As I thought, I need you.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_4100:
As two Trainers who were gifted 
with a vision from Xatu...
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_4200: let’s keep moving forward toward that future!
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_4300:
Hm?
No, you shouldn’t stare into her eyes too long!
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_4400:
You might accidentally see the result of
our battle.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_4500: That would take the fun out of it, wouldn’t it?
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_4600:
We may be able to forecast the future, but it
is up to us to be able to pave the way to it!
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_4700: I’m looking forward to our future!
